message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value of cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see the section labeled "Cash and Cash Equivalents" which contains three line items:
- Beginning Balance: 8000000.00
- Ending Balance: 7669648.58
- Net Increase: -330351.42

The "Beginning Balance" represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period, which is 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'}}
```
